price: Wanti isaan ittiin qanani’aa turan [adaba Rabbii irraa] maal isaan irraa deebisa?
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yumattaʿūna
